content: i have one final pattern available for you to work on this holiday season and it s one i really think you will love crochet snowflakes are perfect for many holiday projects crochet yourself a snowflake garland to string over the mantle embellish your holiday hats with a snowflake attach them to a place mat or table runner use them as christmas tree ornaments really there are so many uses for them did i mention they only take about 20 minutes to make you can whip up a dozen in no time
